description: After more ways to use cauliflower? Try this incredibly colourful roast cauliflower and pearl barley salad that makes for a perfect side dish.
name: Roasted Cauliflower & Pearl Barley Salad Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
2 tbs Macro seed mix with pepitas & sunflower seeds
1.5 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil

recipeInstructions.text: Combine barley and cauliflower mixture in a large dish. Crumble over feta, drizzle with dressing and top with herbs. Serve.
